QuestData.Title: The Vesper Rings
QuestData.Description:
Loyalty shall no longer be a demanded tenet of the Path, but rather a virtue that is earned. A choice.
We must show devotion to those who struggle, whether they are recently arrived souls or peers who need our aid.
It will take all the anima at hand to rededicate this temple. And in so doing, to ring in a new age for the kyrian.
I fear the Mawsworn may attempt to thwart our plans. Protect me during this ritual, $n. We must see this through.
QuestData.LogDescription: Protect Polemarch Adrestes as he rededicates the Temple of Loyalty.
